#summary ^if and 'else' samples.

= If =


Sample without 'else':

{{{
	$something[val]
	^if($something eq 'val'){
		something is equal
	}
}}}
result is 'something is equal'.


Sample with 'else':

{{{
@main[]
	$somevar[458]
	^if($somevar == 100){
		true
	}{
		false
	}
}}}
result is 'false' from 'else' branch.
